positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Development of new venture software as senior software engineer.

positions.title: Technical Lead
positions.description:
As a Technical Lead my focus has been to ensure the vision of founders translates into technical excellence, while unlocking the full potential of our engineers.

With my team, we have unlocked the next frontier for [EvidenceHunt](https://evidencehunt.com) by completely integrating with their company for the duration of our collaboration.

- Upgrading from Firebase to a multi-project GCP cloud
- Introducing continuous delivery and GitOps
- Migrating between domain registrars
- Hiring new talent (lead engineer)
- Unlocking collaborative functionality and organization management
- Automatically ingesting and searching through private data sources alongside the public clinical and biomedical research
- Making cloud-native resources reproducible as local development resources
- Migrating between databases
- Ensuring regional data compliance, isolation of client-specific data and enterprise-level security
- Defining data retention guidelines and deletion policies
- Optimizing the website by fixing bugs, implementing new designs, unlocking analytical and search optimization tooling and rebuilding their CMS

Ultimately, unlocking the automation of working with medical evidence, all while supporting a large active user base.
